CustomField.inlineHelpText: 1: Systems are not accessible for 2+ users. 2: Systems not accessible for one user. 3: Systems are working, not fully operational, no workaround. 4: Systems working, not fully operational, have workaround. 5: Low to no impact.
CustomField.label: Severity

value.fullName: 1 - Systems are not accessible for 2+ users.
value.label: 1 - Systems are not accessible for 2+ users.

value.fullName: 2 - Systems not accessible for one user.
value.label: 2 - Systems not accessible for one user.

value.fullName: 3 - Systems are working, not fully operational, no workaround.
value.label: 3 - Systems are working, not fully operational, no workaround.

value.fullName: 4 - Systems working, not fully operational, have workaround.
value.label: 4 - Systems working, not fully operational, have workaround.
